The increasing order of the free-radical scavenging activity was found to be gallic acid > arbutin > ellagic acid > hydroquinone > ascorbic acid [ 94]. A comparative assessment of the antioxidant activity, free radical scavenging activity, and inhibition of lipid-peroxidation using MeOH and aqueous extracts of B. ciliata rhizomes was performed. The MeOH extract exhibited a better antioxidant activity [ 76].
